# init(fontNamed:)

**Initializer**

Initializes a new label object with a specified font.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(fontNamed fontName: String?)
```

```swift
init(fontNamed fontName: String?)
```

## Parameters

- **fontName**: The name of the font used by the label.

## Return Value

An initialized label object.

## Creating a Label

- **init(text:)**: Initializes a new label object with a text string.
- **init(attributedText:)**: Initializes a new label object with an attributed text string.
